title: 在网上下了一下1.6.2的服务端，但是下载后解压完就出现问题了，求教！！！
author: Still丶筱
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Still丶筱 于 2013-9-3 16:13 编辑 

[INFO] Starting minecraft server version 1.6.2
 [INFO] Loading properties
 [WARNING] server.properties does not exist
 [INFO] Generating new properties file
 [INFO] Default game type: SURVIVAL
 [INFO] Generating keypair
 [INFO] Starting Minecraft server on *:25565
 [WARNING] Failed to load operators list: java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\ops.txt (系统找不到指定的文件。)
 [WARNING] Failed to load white-list: java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\white-list.txt (系统找不到指定的文件。)
 [INFO] Preparing level "world"
 [INFO] Preparing start region for level 0
 [INFO] Preparing spawn area: 10%
 [INFO] Preparing spawn area: 28%
 [INFO] Preparing spawn area: 47%
 [INFO] Preparing spawn area: 65%
 [INFO] Preparing spawn area: 77%
 [INFO] Preparing spawn area: 90%
 [INFO] Done (6.891s)! For help, type "help" or "?"
它就出现了这个


what happend
怎么弄？
或者谁有1.6.2的服务端和客户端

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Bruce.Owen 于 2013-9-3 16:24 编辑 

出现楼主所粘贴的报告的最后一行
[INFO] Done (6.891s)! For help, type "help" or "?"


这说明服务器已经启动完毕

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content:
Bruce.Owen 发表于 2013-9-3 16:21 
等他出现Done的时候服务器就已经完成了
这时候就可以进服务器了

replies.author: sweetapple
replies.txt_content:
楼上正解。然后如果你是公网就百度一下ip把百度得到的自己的ip告诉别人别人就能加进来。
如果是内网就自己路由器映射一下具体百度。
